version_description:
If you like Experia please give us a 5-star rating.

- EMI Card Pin change facility
- Flexi Loan minor changes
- Offline Dealer Locator
- Refer and Earn, referral program

1) View your Preferred Card details
2) Update profile details by accessing customer profile
3) Foreclosure Payment
4) Card related FAQ’s
5) Minor bug fixes.

1) Instant Approval new user interface
2) Approval basis product selection
3) Polling: Voice of customer
4) Feedback: to share your views and concerns
5) Bug fixes

1) Google Map integration to view dealer location.
2) Inbox now changed to Request Status.
3) Raise request from Get In Touch.
4) Scheme View basis selection.
5) Approval on new products.
6) Updated Cities.
7) Bug fixes.

1) Google Map integration to view dealer location.
2) Inbox now changed to Request Status.
3) Raise request from Get In Touch.
4) Scheme View basis selection.
5) Approval on new products.
6) Updated Cities.
7) Bug fixes.

1) Touch-id and M-Pin enabled Login
2) New Insurance Products
3) Referral Program
4) Change Login Preference from Securities
5) Minor Bug Fixes
Instant EMI finance approval on durables, electronics, smartphones and furniture.

· Raise Ecommerce related queries
· Make a payment through "Make a Payment"
· Avail exclusive offers from Recommended Deals
· Enhanced user interface for Insta approval
· Minor Bug Fixes

• Addition of new Payment option under Make a Payment
• Addition of new Offers under Recommended Deals
• Resolved customer bugs raised on app store. – App Store
• Minor Fixes

1. Touch ID issues on specific devices resolved.
2. MPin specific issues resolved.
3. Login specific issues resolved.
4. other minor fixes.

1. Touch ID issues on specific devices resolved.
2. MPin specific issues resolved.
3. Login specific issues resolved.
4. other minor fixes.

Multilingual support - एक से अधिक भाषाओं की सुविधा

Languages introduced :
· Hindi
· Marathi
· Gujarati
· Bengali
· Telugu
· Tamil

- Face Id authentication enabled.
- View and download statements.
- iPhone X compatibility fixes.
- Minor improvements.

- Help (chatbot)
- Preapproved & Recommended Offers
- Referral Program
- EMI card FAQs
- Minor Big Fixes

1. Manage EMI Card (Block / Unblock), Change Pin, Card Status
2. New Pre Approved Offer “Bajaj Finserv RBL Supercard”
3. Updated FAQs Section
4. NOC For closed Loans
5. New Customer Flow and Offers
6. Bug fixes.

1.) View “Tips & Articles” (our Blog site) to gain access to all the information on products & its different use
2.) Now you can see the reason for your blocked card, how to unblock with brief description
3.) Raise your queries to track on the App platform resulting into Quick Response & Resolution
4.) Missed Call service under ‘Get in touch’ section to get instant details via SMS of your latest loans, FD and insurance
5.) Better offers for your exact requirement and need, more flexibility
6.) Minor bug fixes

1) Now you don’t need to remember your customer id, just click on remember customer id
2) Now you can set your M-Pin, Face ID using mobile no as a login authentication
3) User specific Insta Service available at the home screen (logged in users).
4) Updated FAQs for Annual fee on EMI Network Card
5) Option to block active cards, Unblock and Re-issue the blocked EMI Network cards
6) In the request raised section: option to track your raised request along with the status.

1) New offers available – Customers (new as well as existing) have the option to get more offers (insurance & travel etc)
2) Seamless BLU Bot Integration – customer can check the account & loan details, statements & EMI Card, etc. using our intelligent BLU bot
3) Login bug Fixes – bug related to m-pin & touch id and other minor fixes done.

1) Introducing Health EMI Card.
2) Check your fee & charges of your Loans.
3) Download Certificate of insurance for your extended warranty Loans.
4) Check out our new Flexi Calculator.
5) Find new and Exciting offers from your pre-approved Offers.
6) Bug fixes.

This week, we’re bringing you Text search for your Statements, SOA, Repayment Schedules, Payments & EMI card details, etc. Just tap on the search option and say like “I want my statements”, “statement of account”, “I want my repayment schedule”, “payments”, “my offers” or “manage EMI card” to go to the desired section. Now you can use mobile number as default login. New and exciting offers (e.g. Health EMI card etc).

We’re committed to giving you the best user experience on our App. Following are some improvements we’re delighted to share with you –

1) BBPS - Introducing the Bharat Bill Payment System to facilitate your needs of payments. Your transactions can now be easily done via multiple modes via Net Banking, Credit Cards, Debit Cards, UPI.

2) In-App Programs - Easy transition between a few popular platforms to get Vouchers, medications.

We’re committed to giving you the best user experience on our App. Following are some improvements we’re delighted to share with you -
1) BBPS - Introducing the Bharat Bill Payment System to facilitate your needs of payments. Your transactions can now be easily done via multiple modes i.e. Net Banking, Credit Cards, Debit Cards, UPI
2) Buy On EMI - Now you can choose from a range of 25,000+ appliances & buy them at No Cost EMI & Zero Down-Payment with Bajaj Finserv EMI Card.
3) In-App Programs - Easy transition between a few popular platforms to get latest news updates, medications, health cover policies etc.
4) Minor bug fixes.
